channel.title: Testscape source is there any possible
channel.description: Testscape source is there any possible...way i can make admins, it says that i can't and im sure theres a way can someone please explain, or at least make me the testscape source with admins, i love testscape[br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2007, 03:30:31 AM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Testscape source is there any possible
item.dc:creator: @ShadowShaft ShadowShaft
item.description:
@ShadowShaft wrote:

search in client java //admin list or //admin you’ll see stuff like if(playerName.equalsIgnorescase(“Name”)) {
playerrights = 3;
}

item.source: Testscape source is there any possible

item.title: Testscape source is there any possible
item.dc:creator: @Mag3_Zarko Mag3 Zarko
item.description:
@Mag3_Zarko wrote:

hmmm mate if you are the server owner you need to go into your source and onto the Characters folder there, there will be a list of names who have been on your server double click on the one who you want to make an admin or modect and it will come up on notepad. About 5 places down there will be a code saying Charactersrights=0 or 1 wateva if you want to change them to server owner delete the 1 and type 3 if you want to be admin type 2 and mod type 1. then save your notepad and Re Compile and you should be done in no time![br][size=1]Posted on: GMT[/size][hr]That Help?

Read full topic
